content: अनुकर्षः --र्षणं {@--1@} Dragging after, drawing along; attraction in general. {@--2@} Summoning or invoking (by means of spells). {@--3@} Grammatical attraction, application or attraction of a word in a preceding rule to a subsequent rule, word &c.; नायमनुकर्षणार्थश्चकारः <ls>Mbh.</ls> on <ls>P. II. 2. 4</ls>; see also <ls>Sk.</ls> on <ls>P. VI. 1. 127.</ls> {@--4@} [अनुकृष्यते स्वसंबद्धेन चक्रेण] The axle-tree or bottom of a carriage. {@--5@} Delayed performance of a duty.
